definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
science and engineering as academic subjects

sentences.english: It is important for engineering students to master specialty courses knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 对工科学生而百，专业课的重要性是不言而喻的。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discusses the necessity and main ways of training technological students for the quality of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 论述了培养工科学生人文素质的必要性和主要途径。

sentences.english: It is highly necessary for engineering students to improve the ability of beauty appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 提高工科学生的审美能力是非常必要的。

sentences.english: What can teachers of Chinese do in vocational colleges?
sentences.chinese: 中文教师在工科类高职院校真的无事可做吗？

sentences.english: Have a technical degree and extensive experience in computers.
sentences.chinese: 具有工科学历和广泛的电脑知识。

sentences.english: Metalworkers ' practice in universities is a required practice course for engineering speciality.
sentences.chinese: 金工实习是高校工科专业的必修性实践课程。

sentences.english: The firm is sponsoring an engineering student at the university.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正资助一名工科学生在大学学习。

sentences.english: Most senior members of the central government were trained in that most practical of disciplines, engineering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数中央政府的高级官员都受过最实用的工科教育。

sentences.english: For those subjects in Engineering and Science, we need students who can demonstrate capabilities in research.
sentences.chinese: 对于工科类学生，我们倾向于有较强研究能力的学生。
这里的工科指的是与计算机相关工程科学。

sentences.english: In many school systems girls are forbidden to take shop sourses.
sentences.chinese: 在许多学校制度中禁止女学生修工科。

sentences.english: Must have a technical degree and extensive expericence in computers.
sentences.chinese: 必须具有工科学历和广泛的电脑知识。

sentences.english: Self-concept of arts students is lower than science students as well as normal students.
sentences.chinese: 文史类专业学生的自我概念低于理工科和师范类学生。

sentences.english: Courfeyrac, you will see the polytechnic students.
sentences.chinese: 古费拉克，你去看看综合工科学校的那些同学。

sentences.english: I would like to study science or engineering in college.
sentences.chinese: 我更愿意在大学里学理科或工科。

sentences.english: The course of analog circuit is a specialized basic course of electrical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 模拟电路是电学工科学生的一门专业技术基础课。

definition: science and engineering as academic subjects
science and engineering as academic subjects
the sciences (as opposed to the humanities 文科[wen2 ke1])
